description.en: Water Resources Management Agency responsible for Pompengan-Jeneberang watershed including Lake Tempe
description.id: Balai Wilayah Sungai bertanggung jawab atas DAS Pompengan-Jeneberang termasuk Danau Tempe

description.en: Watershed Management Agency addressing upstream deforestation and erosion feeding Lake Tempe sedimentation
description.id: Balai Pengelolaan DAS menangani deforestasi hulu dan erosi yang menyebabkan sedimentasi Danau Tempe

description.en: Provincial Environmental Office monitoring lake shrinkage and water quality degradation
description.id: Dinas Lingkungan Hidup Provinsi memantau penyusutan danau dan degradasi kualitas air

description.en: Primary regency governing Lake Tempe, managing local regulations and KJA permits
description.id: Kabupaten utama yang mengatur Danau Tempe, mengelola regulasi lokal dan izin KJA

description.en: Indigenous Bugis community leaders representing traditional fishing rights and customary water governance
description.id: Pemimpin masyarakat adat Bugis mewakili hak nelayan tradisional dan tata kelola air adat

description.en: Traditional fisher organization representing 5,000+ fishing families dependent on Lake Tempe
description.id: Organisasi nelayan tradisional mewakili 5.000+ keluarga nelayan yang bergantung pada Danau Tempe

description.en: Rice farmers expanding cultivation into receding lake areas, competing with fishers for land
description.id: Petani padi yang memperluas budidaya ke area danau yang surut, bersaing dengan nelayan untuk lahan

description.en: Floating cage aquaculture operators, primarily external investors, expanding rapidly in Lake Tempe
description.id: Operator keramba jaring apung, terutama investor eksternal, berkembang pesat di Danau Tempe

description.en: Multi-stakeholder coordination forum attempting to mediate sedimentation, fishing, and land use conflicts
description.id: Forum koordinasi multi-pihak yang mencoba mediasi konflik sedimentasi, nelayan, dan tata guna lahan

description.en: University researchers documenting lake shrinkage, sedimentation rates, and ecological changes
description.id: Peneliti universitas mendokumentasikan penyusutan danau, laju sedimentasi, dan perubahan ekologis
